duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and drive WalkMe strategy, leading the design, build, and maintenance of WalkMe deployments for internal facing applications.
Work across multiple product areas within the Commercial bank, developing strong partnerships with Lines of Business and product teams.
Design, code, test, debug, and document WalkMe capabilities and requirements for projects and programs.
Lead cross functional teams to strategize, plan, and execute a variety of programs, services, and initiatives within technical domain environments.
Perform assessments through fact-finding and data analysis to arrive at creative approaches to solving complex issues and develop appropriate solutions or recommendations.
Collaborate and consult with peers, colleagues, and mid-level managers to resolve technical challenges and achieve goals.
Provide leadership in management of relationships and implementation of programs, services, and initiatives with cross-functional business partners.
Measure and report on the performance of marketing campaigns, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
